There is a ranking system that will put you with people similar in skill. You can play casual game mode, I don't like it cause its a sh*t show, but you may like it. 

Just don't forget to mute anyone who's being toxic towards you and give it a shot. You probably need to spend at least 1000 hours to play at a decent level, but who is saying that you must be high rank to play the game? I find my self tilting more at high ranks cause you expect people to know the basic stuff at least, but you would be surprised how many brain dead people are ranked high. 

So long story short, give it a shot, its a great game, if you find yourself not enjoying the game anymore, you can easily stop and take a break.
CSGO has always been fun, but NA servers are shit every match has at least 1 cheater. this game should have never been free to play.
